cards.name: Mikal, Sword-for-Hire
cards.summon_condition: Control at least 1 Human minion or 1 Warrior minion; Sacrifice Relics or Gears with a total Cost of at least 8
cards.ability:
When Mikal Attacks a non-Warrior she gains +1 Attack, +1 Defense, and +1 Speed until the end of your opponent’s next turn. 
Mikal always deals damage first when she Attacks, regardless of the Defender’s speed.

cards.name: Juno, Steadfast Shieldbearer
cards.summon_condition: Your opponent has at least 1 Minion: 7E; Equip 3 Gear with different types from your Relic Hold onto Juno
cards.ability: When Juno is Summoned you may search your Adventure Deck for a Shield and play it without paying its associated costs and immediately Equip it to Juno. Juno may Equip 2 Shields and 1 Weapon at the same time. Shields Equipped or being Equipped to Juno have a Weight of 0.

cards.name: Dendric, Blade in the Dark
cards.summon_condition: At least 3 or more Minions your opponent control have died: Sacrifice a non-Rogue Minion
cards.ability: Dendric Ignores Defense when Attacking. While Dendric occupies a City Ruin he always deals damage before the opponent when attacking.

cards.name: Larsson, Behemoth-Brawler
cards.summon_condition: Have minions with a sum of 12 or more Attack die in Combat; Your Opponent has at least one Minion: 4E
cards.ability: Larsson does not lose Charge bonuses at the end of turns that he Attacked during your Combat Step. At the end of your Combat Step, If Larsson did not Attack, his Attack becomes 1 until the end of your Opponent’s next turn.

cards.name: Oak-Bent, Forest’s Rage
cards.summon_condition: Have 4 Warrior, Barbarian, and/or Druid Minions; and your Opponent has at least one Minion on a Forest Ruin: 5E
cards.ability: Oak-Bent gains Fortify, Fortify, Fortify anytime she occupies a Forest. Oak-Bent always deals damage first when Defending while in a Forest. Oak-Bent can not attack Gates.

cards.name: Uki, Undaunted Mind
cards.summon_condition: Your Opponent has 1 or more Minions: 12E; Reveal Minions and/or Spells from your hand with a total cost of exactly 12
cards.ability: When Uki is summoned place all cards that were revealed to summon her under her card. Once during your Summoning Step you may play one of the revealed cards without paying their Echo Cost. Minions are Summoned to the Ruin Uki occupies. All Minions that occupy the same Ruin as Uki receive +1 to Attack, Defense, and Speed.

cards.name: Hollow-Step, Forest Specter
cards.summon_condition: Have at least two Minions with different Races; and your Opponent has at least 1 Minion: 8E
cards.ability: After Attacking from a Forest Ruin, Olak’Hult and any Minions in the same Ruin regain all used Movement. Any Minion that regains Movement this way gains Stealth until end of turn.

cards.name: Twice-Strung, Invisible Sniper
cards.summon_condition: Your Opponent has killed at least one of your Minions: Sacrifice a Bow type Gear and Wood Elf Minion
cards.ability: If Plav’Karl would be dealt damage or die while you have cards in your Staging Area or Relic Hold, prevent that damage and sacrifice one of those cards instead. He gains Immortal until end of turn.

cards.name: Malich, Midnight Whisper
cards.summon_condition: Your opponent has played at least 1 card that cost ≥5E: Sacrifice 2 Minions; Reveal 2 Spells with React from your hand
cards.ability: When Malich is summoned place two Arcane counters on him and place all cards that were revealed to summon him under his card. When Malich kills an opponent’s Minion or Hero place an Arcane counter on him. Anytime a React of a Spell card under Malich would trigger you may remove an Arcane counter from him to cast a copy of that spell without paying its cost.

cards.name: Lyndra, High Vicar
cards.summon_condition: Have Combatants you control with 8 or more total Defense die and have at least 1 Minion that is Injured: 2E
cards.ability: When summoning Lyndra you may have her come into play in the same Ruin as any Minion or Hero you control that is Injured. If a Defender occupying the same Ruin as Lyndra would die, instead it is left with 1 Health Counter and Lyndra loses 1 Health Counter.

cards.name: Olak’Hult, Black Blood
cards.summon_condition: Your opponent has at least 1 Minion: Sacrifice a Warrior or Dark Elf Minion that has killed at least one Defender
cards.ability: If a Warrior Combatant that occupies the same Ruin as Olak’Hult would die during Combat it instead is left with 1 Health and Olak’Hult takes 1 Damage.

cards.name: Sliv’Larn, Thieving Shadow
cards.summon_condition: You control 3 or more Rogue or Dark Elf Minions and your Opponent controls at least 1 Hero or Minion: 4E
cards.ability: When Sliv’Larn kills an opponent’s Combatant and your opponent has any Echoes, you take half of those Echoes rounded up.

cards.name: Plav’Karl, Death Refuted
cards.summon_condition: At least 4 Minions you control have died in Combat; Your Opponent has had at least 3 Minions die: Sacrifice a Minion
cards.ability: When you summon Plav’Karl place up to three Minion cards from your discard pile under his card and place 5 Zombie Counters on him. Remove a Zombie Counter: Create a copy of one of the Minions under Plav’Karl’s card. Sacrifice that Zombie at the end of your Opponent’s next turn.

cards.name: Platinum Shield, Unbent Knee
cards.summon_condition: Two or more Minions you control with Fortify have died; Your Opponent controls at least one Minion: 3E
cards.ability: Minions that occupy the same Ruin as Platinum Shield cannot be targeted by your opponent’s Spells and effects. When Attacking you may switch Platinum Shield’s Attack and Defense stats.

cards.name: Seven Fingers, Safety Ignored
cards.summon_condition: You have discarded 2 Relics after using their last Charge Counter; You control at least 1 Artificer Minion: 2E
cards.ability: As long as Seven Fingers is your declared Hero your Relic Hold is increased by 2. When Seven Fingers is Summoned trigger the Recharge of each Relic you control. As long as Seven Fingers occupies your Gate you may Recharge and activate Relics an additional time each Summoning Step.

cards.name: Gem Eye, Terraforming Gleam
cards.summon_condition: Minions you control have occupied 5 Terrain types: 5E; Return a Minion with a cost of 5 or more to your hand
cards.ability: Gem Eye has Ruincraft of all Ruins in play. Once during your Summoning Step you may discard two cards and choose one: 2E: Search your Explore Deck for a non-Mythic Ruin to replace an adjacent Ruin; 5E: Search your Explore Deck for a Mythic Ruin to replace an adjacent Ruin.

cards.name: Kittik, Sly Prankster
cards.summon_condition: Your opponent controls at least 1 more Minion than you: 2E; Reveal a Spell with React that costs 3 or less
cards.ability: When Kittik is summoned place the revealed Spell under Kittik. Anytime a React of the Spell card under Kittik would trigger you may cast a copy of that spell by paying all of its associated costs.

cards.name: Wollow, Earth and Sky
cards.summon_condition: Your opponent has killed a Bogling Minion you controlled during Combat: 3E; Reveal a Bow type Gear from your hand
cards.ability: Wollow enters play with the revealed Bow type Gear equipped. If that Bow would be unequipped it is discarded and Wollow is sacrificed.

cards.name: Tollot, Death Begets Death
cards.summon_condition: You control at least 1 Minion that occupies a Wetland; Your Opponent has at least 1 Minion: 5E
cards.ability: Once during your Summoning Step you may sacrifice a Minion you control that occupies a Wetland. When you do, search your Adventure Deck for a Glyph with equal or lesser Echo Cost and attach it to a Legal Target that occupies a Wetland Ruin.

cards.name: Andol, Coastal Raider
cards.summon_condition: Your Opponent has at least 1 Relic or Gear in their Relic Hold; You control at least one Merfolk Minion: 4E
cards.ability: When Andol Attacks an opponent’s Combatant you may discard a card to gain control of a Gear equipped to that Combatant. When Andol Attacks an Opponent’s Gate you may discard two cards to gain control of a Relic in your opponent’s Relic Hold.

cards.name: Lobda, Avenging Tide
cards.summon_condition: Your Opponent controls at least one more Minion than you; Your Opponent has killed at least 1 Merfolk Minion you control: 4E
cards.ability: While occupying a Lake or Island Ruin, Lobda gains Assassinate, Blitz, Bloodlust, and Charge. When a Minion you control dies your opponent sacrifices a Minion with equal or greater Cost if able. Otherwise, they sacrifice a Minion they control with the highest Cost.

cards.name: Kendlo, Deep Tactics
cards.summon_condition: Your opponent has occupied a Lake Ruin: 5E; Reveal a Merfolk Minion from your Hand with Cost less than or equal to 4
cards.ability: Place the revealed Merfolk under Kendlo. This Minion does not count toward your Leadership limit. It is treated as if it were in the Staging Area and occupying the same Ruin as Kendlo at all times but does not count toward a Ruin’s Occupancy. If it were to die at any time, return it to your hand.

cards.name: Hun Kaw, Night Feathers
cards.summon_condition: Your opponent has killed a Bogling Minion you controlled during Combat: 4E; Shuffle your hand into your Deck
cards.ability: Hun Kaw deals damage first when Attacking and deals 0 damage when Defending. If Hun Kaw would be dealt damage from a combatant and there is an adjacent Ruin she can occupy that is legally connected, you may move her to that Ruin and prevent that damage.

cards.name: Roo Ja, Bolt From Above
cards.summon_condition: Have a Bow Gear in your Relic Area; Your opponent has at least 1 Minion: 6E; Discard two Spells from your hand
cards.ability: Roo Ja may attack enemies that are within his Range based on legal Moves from his current position, even if they are not in a straight line. Any stat bonuses from equipped Bows are doubled.

cards.name: Orin, Pack Alpha
cards.summon_condition: You have killed at least one Combatant with a Dracoblood Minion; Opponent controls at least 1 Hero or Minion: 5E
cards.ability: When Orin kills a Combatant you add Echoes equal to that Combatant’s Cost. When Orin Attacks and kills the opponent’s Hero you may search your Adventure Deck, Hand, or Discard pile for any card and play it without paying its associated costs.

cards.name: Steel-That-Lives, Miracle Maker
cards.summon_condition: You control 2 different Relics: Sacrifice a Relic with Cost 5 or greater; Discard an Autonom Minion from your hand
cards.ability: Once during your Summoning Step you may sacrifice a Relic in your Relic Hold to search your deck for an Autonom Minion with equal or lesser Echo Cost. Summon that Minion to the Ruin that Steel-That-Lives occupies or a Legally Connected adjacent Ruin without paying its cost.

cards.name: One Tusk, Primal Justice
cards.summon_condition: Had at least 1 Druid Minion shift; At least 2 Opponent Minions have died in Combat: 3E
cards.ability:
After One Tusk has been in Combat 2 times he may shift between forms at the beginning of your turns.
Beast Form: Dire Bear — +2 Attack, +1 Defense, –4 Speed, –1 Movement; Adrenaline, Blitz, Bloodlust, Charge, Charge.
When One Tusk kills a Defender you gain Echoes equal to the Defender’s Defense.
